name: Neutral Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a flat, closed mouth.

contextMeanings.meaning: Can signal disinterest or waiting for more.
Used to show deliberate lack of reaction.

platformNotes.note: Used in reactions to underwhelming content.

generationalNotes.note: A key emoji for expressing underwhelm.
Used for subtle shade or indifference.
